properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.url
properties.description: PayGo URL either production or sandbox

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.qr64-url
properties.description: PayGo URL part to get QR code image as a base64 encoded string

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.prefix
properties.description: ICEcash unique index at PayGo, also used to generate PayGo ID

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.request-expiry-seconds
properties.description: The length of time (seconds) from PayGo request creation that a payment will be valid

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.group
properties.description: Paygo service kafka listener Group ID

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.admin.header-name
properties.description: HTTP request header name that must be provided for PayGo admin API calls

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.admin.header-value
properties.description: HTTP request header value that must be provided for PayGo admin API calls

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.admin.financial-institution-url
properties.description: PayGo URL part to get financial institutions available for use

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.admin.merchant-url
properties.description: PayGo URL part for merchants CRUD operations

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.admin.authorized-credential-url
properties.description: PayGo URL part for authorized credential CRUD operations

properties.name: ice.cash.paygo.admin.merchant-credentials-url
properties.description: PayGo URL part for merchant credentials CRUD operations

properties.name: mongodb.database
properties.description: MongoDB database name with additional parameters
